hero.headline: Precision engineering solutions for product development, from concept to production-ready designs.

about.title: About Our Team
about.desc: We are a team of passionate engineers and designers dedicated to transforming ideas into precise, manufacturable designs.
about.expertise_desc: With over 15 years of combined experience in mechanical engineering and product design, our team specializes in creating detailed 3D models, technical drawings, and production-ready documentation.
about.expertise_1: Expertise in SolidWorks, Autodesk Inventor, and Solid Edge
about.fast_turnaround_desc: We deliver high-quality CAD models and drawings within tight deadlines.
about.technical_excellence_desc: Our engineers stay updated with the latest CAD technologies and manufacturing techniques.

services.title: Our Services
services.desc: Comprehensive CAD and engineering solutions tailored to your product development needs.
services.modeling_desc: Precision 3D modeling services for parts and assemblies using industry-leading CAD software including SolidWorks, Inventor, and Solid Edge.
services.drawing_desc: Production-ready technical drawings with GD&T (Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing) following ISO standards.
services.prototyping_desc: Design optimization for various prototyping methods including 3D printing, CNC machining, and injection molding.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.desc: Ready to discuss your project? Contact us for a free consultation.
contact.name: Name
contact.sent: Thank you for your inquiry! We will contact you soon.
contact.failed: There was an error sending your message. Please try again later.

footer.desc: Engineering excellence through precision CAD modeling and design solutions.
